item.title: Turning On the External Display for MacBook Air
item.description: Today I encountered a perplexing situation: my MacBook Air suddenly stopped providing a signal to the external display, but the built-in screen was still working. This has happened before â€“ sometimes the external display works, sometimes it doesn’t at all, and I haven’t changed any settings during these times.
